name: Open Plans Search Filter
description: Search and filter the Open Plans database.

inputParameters.name: textFilter
inputParameters.description: text based filter for Open Plans projects. Search project name, architects, description, source, civil engineers and clients.

inputParameters.name: yearOfCompletionFilter
inputParameters.description: Filter Open Plans projects based on year of construction. Use GH Interval/Domain to set 'year from' and 'year to'

inputParameters.name: numberOfPlans
inputParameters.description: Value between 1 and 100; number of plans to retrieve.

outputParameters.name: projects
outputParameters.description: List of open plans projects as dictionaries (not readable by Grasshopper).

outputParameters.name: properties
outputParameters.description: Property values from open plans projects (readable by Grasshopper in tree structure).

outputParameters.name: propertyNames
outputParameters.description: Project property field names from open plans projects (readable by Grasshopper in list).
